title: Bihar polls: Mandate that re-coloured Magadh — a tale of two maps dipped in different hues
description: Bihar's election results stunned pollsters as Nitish Kumar's NDA secured a decisive victory, humbling the opposition.  The mandate underscored the power of disciplined coalitions, targeted welfare, and strategic caste alliances.  Nitish Kumar's enduring appeal, particularly among women voters, and the NDA's cohesive social arithmetic proved overwhelming for a fragmented Mahagathbandhan.

title: How was the first full-colour photograph of Earth captured by NASA
description: NASA's 1967 ATS-3 satellite captured Earth's first true-colour image, revolutionizing weather forecasting and planetary understanding. This breakthrough, using a novel scanning camera, allowed scientists to distinguish cloud layers and storm patterns with unprecedented clarity. The vivid global portrait fostered environmental awareness, bridging science and public consciousness, and laid the foundation for modern satellite imaging.

description: Rahul Gandhi's extensive 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar, despite cultural outreach, failed to translate into votes for Congress. While his national yatras boosted his image, symbolic politics and organizational weaknesses hampered electoral success, particularly in the Hindi heartland, contrasting with victories in southern states.

description: Giannis Antetokounmpo is probable to play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets after resting the previous game due to left knee patellar tendinopathy. The persistent condition requires careful load management, but his recent dominant performance highlights his continued impact. His return is crucial for the Bucks, who are also dealing with other roster injuries.

Microsoft pricing shift: Nadella cites AI impact; software model to adapt
description: Microsoft is shifting its software pricing from a per-user model to a per-agent model as AI systems increasingly perform autonomous tasks. CEO Satya Nadella explained that the company is transitioning to an infrastructure provider, with existing services like Microsoft 365 becoming the core workspace for these AI agents.

14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi shatters Rohit Sharma's long-standing record
description: Vaibhav Suryavanshi eventually finished with an extraordinary 144 off 42 balls, studded with 15 sixes and 11 fours, before falling in the 13th over. His assault powered India A to a massive 297/4 in their 20 overs, with captain Jitesh Sharma contributing a blistering 83 off 32 balls*.

Bihar elections: How exit polls predicted outcome but missed the magnitude
description: Bihar's election results delivered a stunning landslide for the NDA, far exceeding exit poll predictions. While polls correctly anticipated an NDA victory, they drastically underestimated the scale of its triumph. This outcome echoes past elections, highlighting Bihar's unpredictable nature and raising questions about the accuracy of pre-election surveys.

Heart health: The number one food to prevent arterial plaque buildup
description: High blood pressure stands out as one of the known markers behind heart damage and disease. Clinical research has revealed that sipping beetroot juice can trigger a dip in blood pressure within a few hours, marking it as a surprisingly effective natural option, for managing hypertension. The underlying mechanism lies in nitrates, which boost nitric oxide production, prompting vessels to relax and reducing resistance

Bihar polls: How Chirag Paswan emerged as man of the match with 1,800% gains, 70% strike rate
description: In a remarkable turn of events, Chirag Paswan's Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) emerged as a game changer in the Bihar assembly elections, enhancing the NDA's overall performance. With votes pouring in for the LJP (RV), they clinched or led in 19 vital constituencies, dispelling earlier doubts about the alliance's seat sharing.

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi celebrated the NDA's historic win in Bihar, attributing the victory to the "Mahila and youth" and rejecting the opposition's "appeasement politics." Chief Minister Nitish Kumar thanked voters and PM Modi, emphasizing the NDA's unity and commitment to developing Bihar into a leading state.

Prime Minister Narendra Modi made a triumphant entry at the Delhi BJP headquarters, greeted by enthusiastic party workers. The Mahagathbandhan faced a disappointing performance in the polls.

description: India's pacers dominated the opening day against South Africa, bundling them out for 159. Mohammed Siraj highlighted the challenging pitch, noting variable bounce and the effectiveness of bowling stump-to-stump, especially with reverse swing. Jasprit Bumrah's five-wicket haul was crucial. India ended at 37/1, trailing by 122 runs, in a strong position.

Carnage! 15 sixes - Vaibhav unleashes mayhem on UAE in Rising Stars Asia Cup
description: Vaibhav Suryavanshi walked in with quiet intent but unleashed chaos within minutes. Every over seemed to bring a new flurry of sixes as he targeted every bowler with ruthless precision. His 42-ball 144, packed with 11 fours and 15 towering sixes, came at a scarcely believable strike rate of 342.86. The highlight of his innings was the 163-run partnership off just 57 balls with Naman Dhir (34 off 23), which shifted the momentum completely in India A’s favour.

description: An Indian student at Cornell University, Harshvardhan Maskara, shares his journey navigating Ivy League academics and finances. He emphasizes early planning, understanding detailed course policies, and the significant cost of studying abroad, highlighting the importance of scholarships like the TATA Scholarship. Maskara's experience underscores the resilience and adaptability required for international students.

description: Prashant Kishor's ambitious Jan Suraaj party faced a significant setback in the Bihar elections. Despite meticulous planning and a nationwide padyatra, the party struggled to connect with voters on the ground. A lack of local leadership and candidate recognition proved to be major hurdles. The party's focus on professional credentials over local roots also impacted its performance.

description: The National Democratic Alliance is poised to retain power in Bihar with a significantly strengthened mandate, projected to win around 200 seats in the 243-member assembly. description: Errol Musk, father of Elon Musk, expressed concern that the U.S. will be 'doomed' if white people become a minority population within the next 20 years. He drew parallels to South Africa, claiming his community provided for Black people, a statement challenged by the interviewer regarding oppression.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America’s largest carmaker sets deadline
description: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.
